synopsis.text: Spirits's and humans' coexistence in a shared world allows for interspecies romance, yet the Spirits' longer lifespans often lead to witnessing their human partners' deaths. Rebirth does not preserve their past-life memories, leaving spirits bereft. A solution emerges in the form of a mysterious "service" provided by the "Fox Spirit Matchmakers." These matchmakers possess the unique ability to revive lost memories of former lovers, offering spirits a chance to rekindle their love. Our story centers around a young Fox Spirit Matchmaker who dedicates herself to restoring lost memories and fostering love in this world of immortal spirits and their ephemeral human companions.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
